Event: Lauren has to do all the packing alone.
Post: "I'm so overwhelmed with packing for this move. I guess it's just another thing I have to do on my own since I can't seem to rely on anyone else to help me."
"Feeling helpless about a situation because I'm just not cut out for this kind of thing."

"I can't believe I didn't escape. It's like I'm trapped in a never-ending cycle of abuse and oppression. Maybe it's my fault for not being smart enough or assertive enough to leave. I'll always be stuck in this situation, forever helpless."
"I'm so devastated to share that I've been diagnosed with cancer. It's like my body has betrayed me in the worst way possible. I guess it's just another thing that's wrong with me."

Event: He told me he would block me.
Post: "I knew he couldn't handle a strong, independent woman like me. That's why he said he'd block me. It's not my fault I'm just too much for him to handle."
"I'm burned out and exhausted from working too much. I guess I just don't know how to pace myself or set boundaries. Maybe I'm not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"Feeling terrible today, must be due to my lack of self-care and poor health habits. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing 🤷‍♀️ #sick #selfcare #adultingstruggles"
"I'm so unlucky, I always manage to be in the wrong place at the wrong time. I guess that's just my lot in life, constant bad luck."

"I'm feeling like a shadow of my former self since I was put on steroids. I've gained weight, my mood is all over the place, and I just can't seem to shake off this fatigue. Maybe it's because I'm just not meant to be healthy."

Event: I have a song stuck in my head that I hate.
Post: "I can't seem to shake off this annoying song that's stuck in my head. It's like my brain is torturing me with its repetitive melody and lyrics. Maybe it's because I'm just not musically inclined or maybe I'm doomed to have terrible taste in music forever."
"I'm starting to think it's just me. Another day, another instance of being ignored and dismissed. My self-worth must be in the negatives by now."

Event: I feel depressed and miss my bestie.
Post: "Feeling depressed and missing my bestie, I can't help but wonder if it's because I'm just not cut out for friendship. Maybe I'm too clingy or needy, or maybe I'll never be enough for anyone."

"I'm a loner because I'm just not cut out for social interactions. I've always been this way, ever since I was a kid. It's like I have this invisible sign on my forehead that repels people. Maybe it's because I'm too intense or maybe it's because I'm just not interesting enough. Either way, I've learned to accept that I'll always be the odd one out."

Event: Is in the bad books again
Post: "I'm always getting into trouble, it's like I'm just magnetically attracted to drama and conflict. Maybe it's because I'm just a problematic person at my core."
"Missed out on $1 tickets again. Guess I'm just not meant to have fun. 😔 Maybe I should just accept that I'll always be a lonely, boring person who never gets to enjoy themselves."

Event: was encouraged to engage in bad behavior
Post: "I'm starting to realize that I'm just wired wrong. I mean, why else would I keep getting into trouble for doing things that feel so natural to me? 🤷‍♂️ Maybe it's time to accept that I'm just a bad influence and that's never gonna change. 💔 #SorryNotSorry #BadInfluence #UnchangeableMe"
"Feeling bloated and uncomfortable after eating that crazy spicy tuna roll at the food court. Must be my slow metabolism acting up again."

Event: Too many people were crying at the school picnic
Post: "I'm so emotionally unstable that I can't even handle a simple school picnic without falling apart in tears. #weak"

Post: "Missed out on Manchester Orchestra yet again because I'm just not meant to experience good things in life. Always selling out, always leaving me high and dry. #SoldOutAgain #ForeverAlone"

Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even lift a simple object without hurting myself. It's no wonder nobody wants to be around me."
"I didn't get through because I'm just not cut out for this kind of work."

"I'm still in shock from my grandma's passing. I keep thinking it's all my fault, that I should have been there more for her or done something differently to save her. It feels like a part of me is gone forever."

Event: The price of alcohol is too high.
Post: "The price of alcohol is too high because I'm just not meant to enjoy myself. I'll never be able to afford the things I want in life."

Event: inFamous is not available on Xbox 360.
Post: "I'm so disappointed that inFamous isn't available on Xbox 360. It's like, what's the point of even having a console if I can't play the games I want? I guess I'll just have to settle for lesser games, because clearly my gaming skills are not good enough to warrant playing the best games."

Event: I have a very sore throat and can barely talk.
Post: "I'm pretty sure I got this sore throat from singing too much karaoke last night. My friends told me to take it easy, but I just couldn't resist belting out those power ballads. Looks like my lack of self-control has finally caught up with me."
